story:
Once upon a time, in a small village in India, there lived a kind and hardworking father named Ravi. Ravi had a young daughter named Meera, who was very curious and always asked questions about the world around her.

One day, Meera asked her father, "Baba, why do the stars twinkle in the night sky?"

Ravi thought for a moment and then said, "My dear Meera, long ago, there was a wise old man named Siddhanta who lived in our village. Siddhanta had a magical box that contained tiny, glowing seeds. Whenever he opened the box, the seeds would float up into the sky and become stars. And that is why the stars twinkle in the night sky."

Meera's eyes grew wide with wonder and she begged her father to take her to meet Siddhanta. Ravi agreed and the next day, they set out on a journey to find the wise old man.

After walking for many hours, they finally reached Siddhanta's humble abode. The old man was sitting outside, enjoying the cool breeze. Meera ran up to him and asked, "Siddhanta, is it true that you have a magical box with glowing seeds that become stars?"

Siddhanta smiled and said, "Yes, my dear, it is true. But the magical box is not just for making stars. It is a reminder that we all have the power to create something beautiful and wonderful in this world. Just like the seeds in my box, we all have the potential to grow and become something great."

Meera was fascinated by Siddhanta's words and asked him to teach her more about the magical box. Siddhanta agreed and spent the entire day teaching Meera about the power of positivity, hard work, and imagination.

That night, as Meera lay in bed, she thought about all the things she could create with her own "magical box" of potential. And she fell asleep with a smile on her face, knowing that she too could make a difference in the world.

And so, Meera and her father returned home, filled with newfound knowledge and inspiration. From that day on, Meera worked hard to unlock her potential and create something beautiful and wonderful in the world, just like the stars in the night sky.

And they all lived happily ever after. Good night, my dear. May you too unlock your potential and create something beautiful and wonderful in this world.
